name: 3OMB
description: The $2OMB algorithmic token serves as the backbone of a rapidly growing ecosystem aimed towards bringing liquidity and new use cases to the Opera network. The protocol's underlying mechanism dynamically adjusts $2OMB's supply, pushing its price up or down relative to the price of $FTM. Inspired by the original idea behind Basis as well as its predecessors (bDollar and soup), 2omb.finance is a multi-token protocol that consists of the following three tokens: -2omb ($2OMB). -2omb Shares ($2SHARE) -2omb Bonds ($2BOND).
